context_bundle.summary: End-to-End (E2E) testing: Test complete user workflows in browser/app. Simulates real user interactions (clicks, typing, navigation). Frameworks: Playwright (recommended 2024), Cypress, Selenium, Puppeteer. Slowest tests (seconds-minutes per test), most realistic. Patterns: Page Object Model (POM), test user journeys, visual regression testing. Run in CI with headless browsers. Test critical paths: login, checkout, registration. Flaky tests common - use retry logic, explicit waits.

onboarding.quick_start: E2E tests: Test complete user flows in browser. Playwright (recommended): npx playwright test. Test structure: test('user can login', async ({ page }) => { await page.goto('https://example.com/login'); await page.fill('#email', 'test@example.com'); await page.fill('#password', 'password123'); await page.click('button[type=submit]'); await expect(page).toHaveURL('/dashboard'); await expect(page.locator('h1')).toContainText('Welcome'); }). Selectors: CSS (#id, .class), data attributes ([data-testid='submit']), text content (text=Login). Waits: await page.waitForSelector('.loading', {state: 'hidden'}); await page.waitForLoadState('networkidle'). Page Object Model: class LoginPage { constructor(page) { this.page = page; this.emailInput = '#email'; } async login(email, pw) { await this.page.fill(this.emailInput, email); }}. Run: playwright test --headed (with browser), playwright test --project=chromium (specific browser). CI: Run headless in Docker, parallel execution, retry flaky tests (retries: 2).
common_patterns: Playwright test: test('checkout flow', async ({ page }) => { await page.goto('/products'); await page.click('[data-testid=add-to-cart]'); await page.click('[data-testid=cart-icon]'); await page.click('text=Checkout'); await page.fill('#card-number', '4242424242424242'); await page.click('text=Pay'); await expect(page.locator('.success')).toBeVisible(); })

Cypress test: describe('Login', () => { it('logs in successfully', () => { cy.visit('/login'); cy.get('#email').type('test@example.com'); cy.get('#password').type('password123'); cy.get('button[type=submit]').click(); cy.url().should('include', '/dashboard'); cy.contains('Welcome').should('be.visible'); }); })
Page Object Model: class DashboardPage { constructor(page) { this.page = page; } async getUserName() { return await this.page.textContent('[data-testid=user-name]'); } }
Visual regression (Playwright): await expect(page).toHaveScreenshot('homepage.png'); // Compares with baseline
Network interception: await page.route('**/api/users', route => route.fulfill({ status: 200, body: JSON.stringify([{id: 1}]) }));
Multiple tabs: const newPage = await context.newPage(); await newPage.goto('/admin');
Retry config (playwright.config.ts): retries: process.env.CI ? 2 : 0, workers: process.env.CI ? 1 : undefined
